attributes.action: HOME OFFICE MUST ENSURE THAT `NONE`CHARGED PEOPLE DO NOT HAVE DNA RETAINED BY THE POLICE.
attributes.additional_details: WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT `ALL` DNA REMOVED FROM NONE CHARGED PEOPLE, THIS BREACHES HUMAN RIGHTS AND FALLS SHORT OF WHAT HAS BEEN PROMISED BY THE GOVERNMENT, THE WAY THINGS ARE AT THIS TIME CHILDREN AND ADULTS WHO WERE NEVER CHARGED STILL HAVE THERE DETAILS RETAINED, THIS MAKES THE UK A DICTATOR COUNTRY AND WRONG IN LAW.
